Got a birthday party, rehearsal dinner, corporate or other event coming up? We're a great option for your gathering! Inquire today and let us know how we can make your special occasion perfect! Book your party × We are taking online reservations! Let’s ensure you get a great table: Book today! We recommend making a reservation ahead of time. Book your table today! Book Table × Did you know we do catering? Whatever your occasion, however big or small, we have the perfect options to choose from. Cater your birthday party, holiday party, corporate events, wedding festivities and more! Catering Inquiries Job Listings - We're hiring! Call, email or submit an inquiry today to learn more! Job Listings Job Listings - We're hiring! Call, email or submit an inquiry today to learn more! 4948 Centre Pointe Drive suite 101, North Charleston, SC 29418 Visit us at map marker pin Catering Experience the difference Good food is an essential part of any event - let us do the catering and make it one to remember. Inquire about catering Groups & Parties Host your special event with us Not only are we professional caterers, but we are also experienced event planners. Our all-in-one packages are designed with your budget in mind, meaning all you have to do is enjoy the event. Book now a private party Order Online Enjoy your favorites anywhere Don't feel like cooking today? Your favorite food is just a click away. Order online and enjoy! Order Meet The Owners Meet the Obregon brothers. Originally from Peru, they had a dream of sharing Peruvian cuisine and culture with the Charleston community. With years of experience in the hospitality industry, they knew it was their time to create a unique experience for the community. Reservations Make some memories Reservations are not necessary, but they are welcome. Ensure you never miss out. Make an online reservation. It's definitely an upgrade from fast food. It is filled with flavor and a healthy option. The inside was spotless... Review by - Google Angel C: five star review by First time at Mario's and it is worth the visit. Food and staff are great. Best chicken I've had in a long time... Review by - Google Sal: five star review by Delicious food! Definitely going back! Review by - Google Tiago B: five star review by Amazing food fresh and delicious.
